nodes.text: A cell block in the Carbonite Prisoner Storage section of the Minimum Security Section, a sector of the Belsavis prison facility on the planet Belsavis, was overrun by rioting prisoners during the invasion of Belsavis in the Galactic War. Cipher Nine freed Chaney Barrow and Kanjon Slyke from the cell block in order to recruit their help in breaking into Megasecurity Ward 23.
The overrun cell block appears as a subregion of the planet Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is one of the two sites for the Imperial Agent mission "Breakout."
